manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stay Hydrated with Better Life Innovations Water Bottle Discover the perfect blend of style and functionality with our stainless steel water bottle. Its ergonomic built-in handle ensures easy portability, while the double-walled design keeps your drinks at the ideal temperature. No more condensation worries, thanks to our sweat-free technology. Whether you're on a summer hike or a winter adventure, our thermo-proof tech ensures consistent temperatures. Plus, with a secure, leak-proof seal, it's the ideal companion for on-the-go lifestyles. Embrace quality and sustainability with Better Life Innovations.

ThermoProof Technology Keeps your cold drinks icy for up to 24 hours and hot drinks warm for up to 12 hours. 2 Interchangeable Lids Both the BPA & Toxin Free standard and spout lids provide a carrying handle and leak-proof seal. Dishwasher-Safe Place on the Top Rack for a Dishwasher Clean or Opt for a Gentle Hand Wash to Preserve Its Shine.

Cupholder Friendly Perfect Fit, Every Ride. Designed to Seamlessly Slide into All Standard Cup Holders for Hassle-Free Hydration on the Move. Sweat-Free Exterior Say goodbye to wet rings on your table. Our advanced technology ensures a condensation-free grip every time. Wide Mouth It makes it easy to fill, drink from, and clean. Plus, it's ice-cube friendly.

After conquering your workout, indulge in the crisp, cold refreshment from your Better Life Innovations Water Bottle. It's not just a drink; it's a cool wave of revitalization for your body and spirit. Our bottle, your hydration hero, ensures that every sip is as chilled as your determination is fiery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice & Perfect for Everywhere.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have many of bottles from other brands. This will be my favorite water bottle. I got the white one and Loveee it. It is extremly cute and has perfect function.CUTE:: love the Feeling of the surface which like ultra fine sand paper not plastic nor silicone , and the letters are "Engraved" not printed. Love this High End Finished. FUNCTION:: It is light & easy to clean. has a large open mouth and two types of lids. For long time i was looking for the large open mouth bottle for good cleaning. Finally I found it. Happy!. 2 types of lids are usuful for each reasons. one that small lid can be twist to tighten and open , not only push down but also twist for secure. This bottle worked Great for ice water and hot water! Very satisfied with this purchase. will purchase more for x-mas gift & will have other colors for my self.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wow, Impressive bottleI am new to using reusable water bottle so for the price, I decided to give this a try. Bottle itself is lightweight so even after I fill it up with water, it still is light enough to carry in my tote bag and water does not leak which is amazing. I wasn't sure about spending $40-60 for the brand name bottle and I am glad I didn't. This bottle looks and feels luxurious and goes very well with my weekend tote bag and office backpack. I am really enjoying having cold water by my side wherever I go. Also, I already dropped it 3 times by accident but I didn't find any scratches or dents. I am very happy with this bottle. I plan to buy few more as holiday gifts for my best friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thermos you'll love
reviews.reviewText: This thermos takes 20+ ounces of liquid, more than adequate when you go out on an outing. The slim design helps to put it in the backpack when you go on a hike or picnic or work. It stores both cold and/or hot water and lasts the whole day! One down side is it doesn't hold in the cup holder of older cars too well. Because of its height, it may tip over in different directions when you drive. But I've been using this thermos since last fall and enjoying it very much. It's very easy to clean, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars doesn't leak, easy hold pretty colors
reviews.reviewText: Although I do have all size brushes for cleaning same type thing you do need one just like any other. I like that it has colors to choose from. I also love the small spout or the real thirsty large one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coffee Insulated Container
reviews.reviewText: I carry a large Yeti with coffee to work each morning. I run out by 10, thus this purchase. The insulated container doesn’t leak in my backpack and keeps coffee warm till I need it. I am happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good bang for your bucks
reviews.reviewText: I finally found an affordable, functional, and pretty stainless bottle that’s dish-washable. It’s perfect size for traveling to and from work. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Water bottle does what it supposed to. Only one flaw. The bottom is a little rounded and easy to knock over. Wish the bottom was more flat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Last long hours
reviews.reviewText: Light weight, beautiful colors that fits in my car holder! Long last tumbler easily clean in dishwasher. I bought mint green and loved, I ordered different colors for entire family! Nice gift for everyone, including my 3 yr old boy, who fall in love with deep blue, very pretty!
